data.eml:eml: Additions to the hydroids (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa) of the Bay of Fundy, northeastern North America, with a checklist of species reported from the region

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Calder, Dale R. (2017): Additions to the hydroids (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa) of the Bay of Fundy, northeastern North America, with a checklist of species reported from the region. Zootaxa 4256 (1): 1-86, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.556851
